data.description: Press select as much as you can in the 5 seconds you have. Enter your 3 initials for your new high scores!

data.author: Tony Erwin

changelog.release_notes: Don't allow use of cached data when we ask device for geolocation. In addition, improve error message if problem retrieving geolocation (e.g., tell user to make sure Pebble app has authorization to location services).
Show country names instead of 3-letter codes for non-U.S. addresses

Fixes an Android-specific problem where app would crash immediately on launch.

NOTE: Sincere apologies to all Android users who tried Version 1.0. If you try again, I think Version 1.0.1 will at least start-up now. :)

data.description:
Get the nearest address based on your GPS location, and access a history of your 10 past positions.

The app is real, but intended to demo how a backend deployed to IBM Bluemix can power interesting UIs. The server code is written with Node.js and uses Pitney Bowes and Cloudant services. The Pebble client app was written using Pebble.js in the CloudPebble IDE. Source for both is available on GitHub.

latest_release.release_notes: Don't allow use of cached data when we ask device for geolocation. In addition, improve error message if problem retrieving geolocation (e.g., tell user to make sure Pebble app has authorization to location services).

data.title: Where?

data.author: Mobile Innovations

changelog.release_notes: - Fixed SmartAlarm menu on APLITE platform
- Fixed blank text on PowerNap Alert
Fixed a crash on Pebble & Pebble Steel

English:
 - Pebble Time support!
 - New feature: Stand Alert - It will encourage you to stand up and walk a little when you are sat down for long periods.

----
Español:
 - Soporte para Pebble Time!
 - Nueva funcionalidad: Alerta Parado - Te animaremos a levantarte y caminar un poco cuando lleves mucho tiempo sentado.

Now you can start/stop sleep mode without BT connection
Fixed a problem where the app crashed randomly
Now you can enjoy LetsMuv while using other WatchFaces or WatchApp. LetsMuv will work in the background now so you don't miss a step!

data.description:
Monitor your daily activities and track your sleep patterns just from your Pebble. Install LetsMuv and improve your health by tracking your calories burned, steps walked and sleep phases.

Smart Alarm: Wake up refreshed every morning. Track how you sleep and LetsMuv will wake you in the right time of your sleep phase.

Stand Alert: Are you sat down all day long? You shouldn't! LetsMuv will alert you to stand up from time to time.

Power Nap: Wake up refreshed after taking a nap.

Pro Membership: Better charts, set your goals, receive encourage alerts, Pebble Timeline support and more! Become a Pro Member and enjoy a lot of great features that will grow over time!

Background tracking, Timer, Find your phone & more!

---
Español

Registra tus actividades diarias y monitoriza tus patrones de sueño desde tu Pebble. Instala LetsMuv y mejora tu salud sabiendo las calorías que quemas, los pasos que das y conociendo tu forma de dormir.

Alarma Inteligente: Levántate descansado cada día. LetsMuv registrará cómo duermes y te despertará en el momento adecuado de tu fase de sueño.

Alerta Parado: Estás mucho tiempo sentado? No deberías! LetsMuv te alertará para que te levantes de vez en cuando.

Power Nap: Levántate con energía después de la siesta.

Miembros Pro: Mejores cuadros, establecer objetivos, recibir alertas de motivación, soporte para Pebble Timeline y más! Conviértete en miembro Pro y disfruta de más ventajas.

Monitorización en segundo plano, Temporizador, Localiza tu teléfono y mucho más!

latest_release.release_notes: - Fixed SmartAlarm menu on APLITE platform

data.title: LetsMuv

data.author: BVulaj
data.description:
Get a quick overview of your team's JIRA Agile sprint status, including current sprint name, days remaining, and number of story points left to complete.

This application requires a valid JIRA Agile installation with the REST API enabled as well as a valid user with READ permissions.

This application is in no way affiliated with Atlassian or any of their products.
data.title: Agile Sprint Health

data.author: Ravin
data.description:
Simply enter any text you want to see on your Pebble and access it at any time. 

**Note: Your Pebble must be connected to your phone.
data.title: Easy Note

data.author: LiveEnsure
data.description: No passwords. No tokens. No biometrics. Just simple authentication for real people. LiveEnsure® is the next generation security technology that privately authenticates users through an elegant triangulation of their mobile device, location, knowledge, wearables and behavior. It's incredibly easy to use with flexible mashup APIs, free mobile apps and interactive control. Goodbye, passwords.
data.title: LiveEnsure

data.author: robisodd

changelog.release_notes:
v1.1:
Included support for Pebble Time and Pebble Time Round
Background color is Blue on watches with color displays
Added a sensitivity setting (Press Select to modify)
Added persistent storage to save sensitivity settings between uses
v1.0 - Created October 18th, 2014 for this Reddit thread: reddit.com/r/pebble/comments/2jn888/

data.description:
Simple BPM detector. Tap on the Pebble's face (or tap on the table with the hand the watch is on) to get the beats per minute of your taps.

Press the select button to change the sensitivity (how hard you tap on the face, or how hard you tap your fingers on the table or even tap the back of your hand with your other hand).

latest_release.release_notes:
v1.1:
Included support for Pebble Time and Pebble Time Round
Background color is Blue on watches with color displays
Added a sensitivity setting (Press Select to modify)
Added persistent storage to save sensitivity settings between uses

data.title: BPM Detector

data.author: Afonso Santos
data.description:
A real-time, auto-scrolling auto-scalling accelerometer readings plotter

Buttons:
- SELECT: toggle the axis (X/Y/Z) being plotted.
- (2x) UP/DOWN: (jump) scroll left/right
- 2x SELECT: vibrate
- LONG SELECT: change (10hz/25hz/50hz) sampling rate (UP/DOWN)

For more information read:
http://developer.getpebble.com/2/guides/accelerometer.html
data.title: Accelerometer

data.author: Stoneroos
data.description: Fiets! omvat alle functionaliteiten die u verwacht van een smartwatch-app op de Pebble. Zo ziet u op een overzichtelijke manier bij welk knooppunt u zich bevindt en wat het volgende knooppunt van uw route is. Ook de afstand tussen de knooppunten wordt duidelijk weergegeven evenals uw eigen snelheid.
data.title: Fiets!

data.author: Nick Penkov

changelog.release_notes:
* Tracking is done in background worker - not interrupted by notificaitons.
* Tweaks for confirmations with vibrations.
* All parameters added to Companion sync protocol (can be set from Companion App).

Renamed to Pinsleep - requested by Pebble.
New profiles (Normal, No alarms, Everyday alarm).
Minor bugfixes for sync crashes.
Snooze function. Short click activates snooze (if set in settings), long click - cancels the alarm and tracking.

Fix sync crashes.
Voulez-vous coucher avec... PebSlee. - app speaks French.
Optimized memory usage.
Responds to companion app for toogle sleep mode.

Back button on main windows works only when sleep is not active (stopped) - can be used to light up display while active.
Added 2 new options for sensitivity that affect the statistics and wake up timers - Sensitivity of falling asleep (slow, normal, and fast) Sensitivity of movement (not sensitive, normal, very sensitive)

Fix stats persistence size (10)
Action menu with - View stats, Clear Stats, Set time, Version
DB and version maintanance
Fix bug in storing statistics when having more than 10 days tracking. Note that this version will delete old statistics data.

Sync Screen.
Persist motion values in byte scale.
Sync data - set start end time from phone.
Sync data - send last sleep motion values to phone app.

Store last 10 sleep statistics
Stat screen supports navigation between sleep stats
New UI for stat screen

Smart alarm - the alarm is set in interval, and the application chooses a moment in this interval, when your sleep is most light - this avoids the dizziness and the feeling of missing enough sleep.
Autonomous application - no need of applications running on your smart phone - you can configure and managed the alarms completely on your smart watch.
Reduced power usage - the application comes even with its first version with optimized algorithm for saving the energy of your Pebble.
Background process - the application is able to run in foreground and to suppress the background processes like fitness apps, that can interrupt the app execution during night.
Sleep monitor stats - just after stoping the alarm.

data.description: Former PebSlee application. Smart sleep alarm and sleep tracking app with free Companion apps for fetching and syncing data with Apple HealthKit and Dropbox. Android and iOS Companion apps are optional, all the tracking and alarm can be configured and run on the pebble watch. Voulez-vous coucher avec... Pinsleep. App speaks French. Soon German, Spanish and Chinese are on the way. For more details visit http://www.pebslee.com If you like it, spread the word, give us a heart Français Réveil intelligent et enregistrement du sommeil, avec un produit gratuit pour sauvegarder et synchroniser vos données avec Apple HealthKit et Dropbox. Les applications supplémentaires pour Android et iOS sont optionnels, l’enregistrement et l’alarme intelligente peuvent être configurés et exécutés sur la montre Pebble.
data.title: Pinsleep

data.author: Tile Team
data.description: “Pebble tiles!” is an addictive game fit for casual game-play. It is minimalist in nature and is purely a skill based game which gives the game's attention, patience and dexterity a whirl. The game challenges the gamer to strike scrolling rock-tiles at a particular place and crush them to pebbles. The game starts out slow but then increases in speed and challenge with each crush.
data.title: Pebble Tiles!

Apnea Breathing Master is an app used to train your lungs in order to increase its capacity so you can stay longer underwater when freediving.
You should set a difficulty which is challenging to you but not too hard so you can practice 10-15 minutes, few times per week. You will notice the improvement in a week !

More features will come soon, if you have any suggestion just drop me an email :)

data.description:
Baby movement counter for the 35-week onwards pregnacy.

Remembers:
- at what time #10 fetal movements where reached
- how many fetal movements accumulated by 9pm.

If you set it up on UP-quicklaunch button only 2 button presses needed per movement.

Will auto-exit after 15 seconds.

data.author: Afonso Santos

changelog.release_notes: Restored support for Pebble Time Round

data.description:
FlipClock3D is a gravity & gesture aware 3D interactive fliping clock.

Buttons:
- UP/DOWN: +/- spin speed.
- SELECT: transparency (SOLID/XRAY/WIREFRAME).
- LONG SELECT: configure digit font.

Gestures:
- TWIST: mode change (DYNAMIC, STEADY)
- PUNCH: spin faster
- YKES : stop spinning, make Day/Hour/Minute faces visible.

latest_release.release_notes: Restored support for Pebble Time Round

data.author: Alexey 'Cluster' Avdyukhin

changelog.release_notes: Правильное обрезание длинных строк (обход бага в прошивке).
Маленький багфикс при отправке сообщения в групповой чат.
После отправки сообщения теперь идёт возврат к сообщениям.
Исправлен баг, из-за которого приложение пыталось отправлять сообщения пользователю №1 (Павлу Дурову).
Очень сильная оптимизация. Проблем с памятью и вылетом приложения на больших сообщениях теперь не должно быть.
Вроде теперь не зависает из-за нехватка памяти.
И ещё одно маленькое исправление. Последнее на сегодня. Честно.
Уменьшена максимальная длина сообщения, а то памяти иногда всё-таки не хватает.

data.description: Russian social network client. Клиент для социальной сети "ВКонтакте" (VKontakte). Позволяет просматривать последние личные сообщения и отвечать на них заранее заготовленными фразами или голосом. Также возможно просматривать уведомления (комментарии, лайки). Про получение токена можно почитать тут: http://clusterrr.com/pebblevk/ Внимание: обязательно требуется поддержка кириллических (русских) шрифтов на часах.

data.description:
A simple app to keep track of up to 8 scores (+positive or -negative), with customizable increments.

Up/Down: Increment / Decrement score.
Long Up/Down: Change player.
Long Press Select: Reset a score to 0.
Select: Change increment / number of players.

data.description:
Russian train schedule. Приложение, которое отображает расписание электричек на основе Яндекс расписаний. Есть возможность автоматического поиска ближайших станций в заданном радиусе на основе геолокации телефона. 
Эта версия не требует приложения компаньона.
Внимание! Для корректной работы приложения на часах должна быть установлена прошивка с кириллическими шрифтами.
По непонятной причине не работает на iOS!

data.description:
Free Alarm clock that can only be switched off when you are really out of bed! Place your Pebble out of reach before you go to sleep.  You can only stop the Alarm on your phone when you walk to your PEBBLE and press the right middle button!

Use dismiss type PEBBLE in the Alarm clock.
data.title: Get out of bed Alarm for PEBBLE

data.author: MattyCo
data.description:
Real time graph visualisation of accelerometer data.  Runs at a sampling rate 25hz. The values displayed represent the mean value of each axis (X, Y, Z)r eceived per second.
The accelerometer data is transmitted to the phone using AppMessage protocol. The watch app displays the number messages sent to phone app/ received by phone app/ and failed to send to phone app.
data.title: Real-time Accel Graph

data.description: Now you can play the Mutant: Year Zero rpg and look cool at the same time. Roll the dice with a flick of your wrist. Add base, skill and object dice with the three buttons. Do you need to stress a roll? Just hold the up button and roll again. Clear the dice by holding down.
data.title: Mutant: Year Zero

data.author: Sheldon Smith
data.description:
A game clock and 30-second play clock that can be controlled independently. 

New: Game clock defaults to 30 minutes but can be adjusted to any value and will be saved in memory. 

Instructions
**************
UP BUTTON: Start 30s play clock/Reset play clock
LONG PRESS UP: Start 60s play clock

DOWN BUTTON: Start/Stop game clock

SELECT BUTTON (Long Press):
Enters setting mode.  If game clock is in the middle of a countdown, up and down buttons adjust the game clock.  Single click the select button again to exit the settings mode.  Long click to reset the game clock to the original value.

If game clock is already reset, long pressing the select button will enter a special mode to adjust the game clock's value.  For example, if you change the game clock from 30 minutes to 25 minutes, the clock will automatically reset to 25 minutes in the future.

The current mode of the clock is displayed in the top left corner of the screen.
data.title: NGFFL Referee Timer (30/60 play clock)

data.author: Otosense
data.description: OtoSense is a new way for you to interact with and react to the significant sounds you want to be aware of. You can teach OtoSense to learn the sound of your doorbell, smoke and fire alarms, telephone ringing, among other audio alerts and sounds, and then receive a notification on your watch when one of them occurs.
data.title: OtoSense

data.description:
Want a handy way to keep your Fate/Fudge dice with you on the trip? Or maybe you have a hard time keeping track of your Fate points?

With this app you have both a set of dice and a points counter on your wrist, both styled to impress at the RPG table.

May you roll well!

Match'em is a simple one touch game that will keep you entertained for hours.
Tap when the circles are alike, else you lose.

If you're looking for a challenge, Match'em is your best choice !

Update with new features coming in a few monthes, when the Pebble Time will be released.

changelog.release_notes:
fixed loading issue for postseason
fixed game time calculation
added date for games not this week

fixed OT time display,
fixed configuration display,
updated to conform to latest pebble sdk changes,
linted,
separated js

upgraded to SDK 3
optimized memory use for list display
refactored all of the things
fixed refresh issue with plays list
replaced all graphics
added color schemes
fixed timezone issue (same as MLB)
finally fixed jumbled text on notification (also fixed for current plays)
cleaned up some warnings

made recent plays view scrollable
added white space between recent plays
fixed recent plays length

fixed "undefined" in game list for OT games
fixed postseason games not showing up
added recent plays display (press down from game screen)

added loading indicator for previous/next week selection
fixed quarter being displayed as part of loading when returning to list from game

removed time from game list since it was start time and not remaining time which is generally useless after the game starts
added refresh rate
fixed initial display of favorite team if game is not today
added previous/next week

fixed random "undefined" showing in list fixed some game status issues fixed long press up and down to cycle games updated layout to accommodate longer team names fixed displaying possession and timeouts after game has ended

data.author: Swim.com

changelog.release_notes:
** Fixes incorrect timestamp on workouts 
** Increases time before switching to Rest mode during turn

*** Hold Top button to start single interval with AI off (interval only ended with workout end or bottom button press) 
 *** Hold Middle button to start single workout with all intervals with AI turned off (rest mode only through pressing bottom button for all intervals)  
 *** Vibrate on start/stop interval with AI off
 *** Remove vibrate on start/stop AI interval
 *** Toggle view in rest mode by pressing bottom button
 *** Save workouts with GMT

- Adds 3.X support for Pebble and Pebble Steel
- Adds automatic intervals (no button presses to pause swimming)
- Re-maps button presses
Reduces missing workout data on upload
Updates compatibility issues for Pebble Time connecting to Android devices

- Adds Pebble Time support
- Unpair Pebble from phone and re-pair if workout does not upload

data.description:
Swim.com brings all the functionality of a smart swim watch onto Pebble with the most advanced swimming app available. The Swim.com app automatically records distance swum, lap times, pace, strokes and other key metrics to provide feedback about your swim. Workouts can be automatically synced to Swim.com using the companion app where you can track your progress, connect and compete.

v2.1 INSTRUCTIONS: http://sw.im/how-to

v2.1 BUTTON MAPPING: http://sw.im/buttons

latest_release.release_notes:
** Fixes incorrect timestamp on workouts 
** Increases time before switching to Rest mode during turn

data.title: Swim.com

data.author: Stanfy

changelog.release_notes: Fix some issues on Pebble Round
Fixed bugs on Aplite for the latest firmware version 3.8
Added support of Pebble Time Color and Pebble Round
- Added support for multiple calendars. Now the events from all of your selected Google Calendars combined and three nearest are displayed on your Pebble (this is in beta for now)
- fix issues with resolving auth token on Android

data.description:
Displays 3 nearest events from your Google calendar - just login to your Google calendar in the app settings and you are ready to go.

No companion app required.
Works with iOS and Android.

All features:
- shows 3 calendars event
- indication of upcoming event (in less than 10 minutes)
- digital clock
- current date
- battery charge and bluetooth indication

Controls:
SELECT button - fetch events immediately.

latest_release.release_notes: Fix some issues on Pebble Round

data.title: My Calendar

data.author: Bert de Ruiter
data.description:
With Rip 1 you can send farts to all your friends using Rip 1.

Send a fart with the center button.

You will need the Android app to be able to use this.
In the Android app, press the menu button and go to settings, from here you can install the watchapp and enable the service to enable sending farts from your Pebble.

(Your friends without Pebble watches can also use the Android app )
data.title: Rip 1 - Fart with friends
